description: Give this luxurious pork roast recipe a try. Juicy pork shoulder is served with roasted honey pears. This dinner is sure to impress the family.
name: Simple roast pork with honey pears Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240째C/220째C fanforced. Remove pork from packaging and discard netting. Place pork on a large greased baking tray with sides. Pat skin dry with paper towels. Drizzle pork with oil and rub with salt. Roast for 1 hour or until skin is golden and crisp.
Meanwhile, combine honey, vinegar, thyme and 1/2 cup water in a small jug.

Remove tray from oven. Using a large spoon, carefully skim and discard any excess fat from tray. Add pears, cutsides down, to tray and drizzle with honey mixture. Reduce oven temperature to 200째C/180째C fan-forced.
Bake for a further 45 minutes or until pork is cooked through and pears are tender. Cover loosely with foil and rest for 20 minutes. Slice. Serve pork with pears and pan juices.
